thread.title: Vote for the SportsDayHS Hero of the week (10/19)
thread.title_full: Vote for the SportsDayHS Hero of the week (10/19) | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Vote for the SportsDayHS Hero of the week (10/19)
text:
On Thursday and Friday night, the only way to keep up with your team and games across the area is beta.SportsDayHS.com . Get live play-by-play and stats so you can get up-to-the-second updates directly on your phone. Find your game here and follow the action throughout Week 8.
Welcome to the 2015 SportsDayHS Hero award campaign!
Here's how it works:
Each week, beginning Mondays at 12:01 a.m., we unveil five nominees for the Hero award. You can visit this page -- SportsDayHS.com/hero -- to cast your online ballot.
Remember: Nominees each week are also included in our staff's consideration for SportsDayHS' offensive and defensive players of the year in January.
Here is this week's poll:
Vote for the Week 8 SportsDayHS Hero
Can't see the poll? Click here to vote.
On Twitter:
 @SportsDayDFW
